Name: Medusa Frontier
About the game: A science fiction survival game being developed using a custom engine. Gather resources, build a base, glide in a hover craft and try to avoid damge. Most features are in development and the rules are mostly simple: 1. NO item restores HP instantly. Ever 2. HP recovers slowly. 1hp per minute. 3. Damage sources can cause HP drain or damage. Sounds simple enough right? It is for now because Medusa Frontier is in development and lava is currently the only damage source. Current Features include. -------------------------------- *Resource gathering, Base building, Hover Vehicles. *Large explorable map & Simple Inventory system! *Developed with a Custom Game engine. *GPU friendly Rendering & Shaders *Very Responsive GUI and inventory. Please Note! This is an Early Access game in Early development. There is no character animation yet.(Not a priority for intended game experience) Updates can cause save file and base construction resets. No HP recovery in the free demo.(No game over condition either) There are no OPTIONS menus yet.(Menu options will be very minimum.) Most features are in development. For Example: A better save system is in development.
